description: Adds barrels and a furnace. The barrels will clear their contents if the plot is empty.
Adds three resource banks and a speed toggle for them. Also allows upgrading your housing with banked gold.
Adds a reforge table, a device, and emergency grenades.
Adds a second floor with an ender chest and brewing stand.
Adds a private farm and merchant, as well as a second floor furnace. Also unlocks a new bank.
Adds a shard converter and an anvil. Also unlocks a new bank.
Adds a contraband trader, and upgrades the shard converter. Also unlocks a new bank.
Upgrades the shard converter again, allowing access to the shadow forge.
